line_1: The Girl agog, the Gallant ready;
line_2: So lightly down he lays my Lady.

line_1: I come down stairs, the cocoa ready, —
line_2: For you must know I'm turn'd fine lady,

line_1: An' soon I made me ready;
Be always for the journey ready:
line_2: May your old shoes, your staff and plaidy,
Nor tale, nor sonnet, for my lady,

line_1: Whose plate and potatoes to me are ay ready:
line_2: Present my best wishes unto the good lady,
